They also complete Interpersonal Patient-Provider Relationship Scale ( IPPRS ) Was Worth It ( WIW ) questionnaires final day treatment . Data share physician , patient , clinical assistant may support physician ( e.g . nurse , nurse practitioner ) . - Group 2 ( active ) : Patients complete QOL assessment ( e.g. , LASA ) IPPRS WIW questionnaires group 1 .
